short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your new tabs into a personal notebook!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn your new tabs into a personal notebook!

With this extension, you can use any new tab as a space to jot down your thoughts and ideas. Simply click on the blank page and start typing. Your notes will be automatically saved and synced across all your tabs, but they will stay private in your browser. You can also use tab key to indent your text, and easily open markdown links and URLs with a right-click. Make your new tabs work for you!
